Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale red-orange pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the grooved exterior is covered with a red-orange slip and faint traces of one line of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393844) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393844)
